TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LikeOperator extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This class provides helpers that the Visual Basic compiler uses to do the work for the [Like Operator](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md). It is not meant to be called directly from your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object LikeObject (object Source, object Pattern, Microsoft.VisualBasic.CompareMethod CompareOption);
.method public static object LikeObject(object Source, object Pattern, valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.CompareMethod CompareOption) cil managed

Docs.param: The string against which `Source` is being compared.
A enumeration specifying whether or not to use text comparison. If , this method uses text comparison; if , this method uses binary comparison.
Docs.summary: Performs binary or text string comparison given two objects. This helper method is not meant to be called directly from your code.
Docs.returns: A value indicating whether the strings match. Returns if the strings match; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see [Option Compare Statement](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool LikeString (string Source, string Pattern, Microsoft.VisualBasic.CompareMethod CompareOption);
.method public static bool LikeString(string Source, string Pattern, valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.CompareMethod CompareOption) cil managed

Docs.param: The string against which `Source` is being compared.
A enumeration specifying whether or not to use text comparison. If , this method uses text comparison; if , this method uses binary comparison.
Docs.summary: Performs binary or text string comparison given two strings. This helper method is not meant to be called directly from your code.
Docs.returns: A value indicating whether the strings match. Returns if the strings match; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see [Option Compare Statement](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
